DOC.brief_summary: The objective assess effect high viscosity vs. medium low viscosity oat β-glucan post-prandial glycemic response healthy adult participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect Oats Post Prandial Glucose Response
DOC.detailed_description: The trial 3 week double-blinded , randomize , cross-over design 3 treatment intervention ( oatmeal breakfast costain low , medium high viscosity beta glucan ) period separate 5-7 day washout period . Normoglycemic ( < 5.6 mmol/L ) male female ( 12 ) age 18-45 body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5-29.9 kg/m2 recruit . Each participant receive follow breakfast food random order : 1 ) oat meal contain low viscosity beta glucan ; 2 ) oat meal contain medium viscosity beta glucan ; 3 ) oat meal contain high viscosity beta glucan . The participant ask consume one breakfast food visit . Following blood sample , appetite , physical comfort , energy/fatigue , palatability treatment measure visual analogue scale ( VAS ) . Glucose measurement : Capillary blood collect visit finger prick . Blood collect fast 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 120 minute first bite/sip test product accord Clinical Laboratory Standard Institute ( CLSI ) guideline . Blood glucose measure finger prick blood sample glucose meter . Males schedule three session 3 week . Women schedule first two week menstrual cycle ( follicular phase ) , per week . During wash-out day ( 5 - 7 day phase ) , participant go daily activity unrestricted follow exception : strenuous activity alcohol consumption day clinic visit . The investigator ask participant go sleep time day session .
DOC.criteria: Normoglycemic ( < 5.6 mmol/L ) BMI= 18.529.9 kg/m² A change medication ( dose type ) medical event require hospitalization within past month . Daily tobacco use . Eat meal irregular unusual time . Food allergy , aversion unwillingness eat study food . Use prescription nonprescription drug , herbal nutritional supplement know affect blood sugar . Presence gastrointestinal disorder . Currently pregnant lactating .
